member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS
member.summary: Represents a set of properties for outputting a single page of a Portable Document Format (PDF) file.

member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Outputs the page with the specified background color. The default is {1.f, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f}, which represents the values 1.0 for red, green, blue, and alpha channel, respectively. These values, taken together, represent white at full opacity.

member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS.DestinationHeight
member.summary: Outputs the page at the specified height. The default is 0.f.

member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS.DestinationWidth
member.summary: Outputs the page at the specified width. The default is 0.f.

member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS.IgnoreHighContrast
member.summary: False to use the system's high contrast display settings; otherwise true. The default is true.

member.name: PDF_RENDER_PARAMS.SourceRect
member.summary: Outputs a rectangular portion of the original page, as defined by the D2D_RECT_F structure's upper-left and lower-right corner x- and y-coordinates. The default value is 0.f for all coordinates.
